concept.title: Annual Inspection And Certification

audience.otherprops: safety and compliance officers, maintenance supervisors, quality assurance, plant management, records management

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Requirements for annual inspection certification and audit of lockout tagout program including checklists corrective actions and reporting.

othermeta.name: taxonomy
othermeta.content: domain:ehs/usecase:perform-annual-inspection-and-certification/industry:glass manufacturing heavy machinery and industrial equipment

ol.li:
At least annually, each authorized employee must be observed performing a Lockout Tagout Tryout process in order to document that the requirements of this program are being followed. This includes:
Demonstrating proficiency by making use of locks, tags, and related lockout equipment.
Properly following all steps as outlined in the manufacturer and in-plant instructions.

The Plant Supervisor or other designated person must perform this inspection and certification using the Form EHS-02-107-F 003 Lockout Tagout Annual Inspection and Certification Audit Checklist or equivalent.

A record of this observation must be maintained and documented using the form EHS-02-107-F 004 Lockout Tagout Annual Inspection and Certification Audit Log or equivalent.
Completed Checklists and Logs shall be submitted to EHS for filing annually.
Records shall be retained by EHS for a period of at least three (3) full calendar years.
